memberdef.argsstring: (struct ssh_poll_handle_struct *p, socket_t fd, int revents, void *v_s)
memberdef.name: ssh_socket_pollcallback

briefdescription.para: SSH poll callback. This callback will be used when an event caught on the socket.

parameterdescription.para: Poll object this callback belongs to.
The current poll events on the socket.
Userdata to be passed to the callback function, in this case the socket object.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, < 0 when the poll object has been removed from its poll context.

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_socket s, const char *host, uint16_t port, const char *bind_addr)
memberdef.name: ssh_socket_connect
